name: Marantz and Denon AVR controller
description:
Control your Marantz or Denon AVR from GNOME Shell.
> This extension is not affiliated, funded, or in any way associated with Marantz and Denon.
This is a fork of the extension [Denon AVR Controller](https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/2371/denon-avr-controler/) with added support for newer Denon and Marantz API.
 Afrer installation go to the extension settings and set the url for your device (e.g. http://denon.local:8080). Your device could be using one of 2 apis, you can switch in the extension settings between the old and new API, if one doesn't work try the other. Leave a comment on th eextensions page with your device model and what API you used.

 Tested with Denon AVR-1912.
